title: Tim Kaine Made DNC Vice Presidential Deal with Hillary Clinton in 2011
subtitle: While a timeline about Tim Kaine's former position as DNC chair is roughly accurate, political reporting from that time suggested a more complicated chain of events.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Hillary Clinton's running mate Tim Kaine stepped aside as DNC chair in 2011 to allow Clinton supporter Debbie Wasserman Schultz to take the job spot in exchange for a slot on the 2016 ticket; in October 2016,
